meta.title: Jonas Danilov — Web developer, information security consultant

about.meta:title: Jonas Danilov
about.title: Hi, I’m Jonas 🤪
about.content: An ethical hacker, a web application developer, I have experience working on high-load projects, I conduct audits in the field of information security.

webtransfer.title: 🏦 Webtransfer Finance
webtransfer.description: I started my professional career as a junior developer and information security specialist. I had a chance to work with a highly loaded credit exchange.

ipserver.title: 👩‍💻 Ipcserver LP
ipserver.description: The main areas of work were: process automation, software development for interaction with server hardware and data centers, development of tools for internal communication and employee control.

donatepay.title: 🎮 DonatePay
donatepay.description: The work consisted of designing and developing the interface (UI/UX) of the new version of the web application, team and project management, optimize the server environment and solve problems caused by a sharp increase in traffic (COVID implications).

esteri.title: 🇮🇹 Italian Institute of Culture in 🇺🇦 Ukraine
esteri.description: Mobile news app for the Italian Institute of Culture in Ukraine. Main technologies used during development: React Native, Firebase.

bitcy.title: 🤑 Bitcy
bitcy.description: Game on the bitcoin rate. Main technologies used during development: Vue.js (Nuxt.js, Vuetify), Apollo Server (GraphQL)

dante.title: 🛡 Dante Web GUI
dante.description: Developed in 2018, the Dante server management GUI (Proxy 6). The main purpose is an easy connection for Telegram users.

streamtip.title: 👾 Donation service
streamtip.description: Service for accepting donations on streams. Originally developed as a college thesis (~2018). It was later published on Github.

b2bhomer.title: 🏠 B2Bhomer
b2bhomer.description: Corporate search and rental housing service in Germany. Technologies used: React, Apollo Server, Node.js .

pentests.title: 👨‍🔬 Information Security Researcher
pentests.description: This field of activity is my hobby. I have experience in conducting audits in banks, government resources, electronic signature providers, mobile operators, social networks... /Observing the NDA, I cannot disclose information about some of the clients./

webtransfer.title: Webtransfer Finance
webtransfer.subtitle: Information security specialist, Web application developer (Junior)
webtransfer.description: I started my professional career as a junior developer and information security specialist. I had a chance to work with a highly loaded credit exchange.
